import { useState, forwardRef } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Card, Container, Button, Typography, Divider, Grid, IconButton, Slide, Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogContentText, DialogActions, } from '@material-ui/core' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/DeleteForever' import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ListRounded' import useStyles from './styles' const Transition = forwardRef(function Transition(props, ref) { return ; }) const EditCard = ({ employee, currentId, setCurrentId, setShowEmployeeForm, setShowEmployeeGrid }) => { const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => { } const handleEditButton = () => { setCurrentId(employee._id) setShowEmployeeGrid(false) setShowEmployeeForm(true) } const handleDeleteButton = () => { setCurrentId(employee._id) warningDialog() } return (
{employee.firstName} {employee.lastName} {"Use Google's location service?"} Let Google help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to Google, even when no apps are running.
) } export default EditCard
